text: Jadugaram ne akhi'a ki asim tuhanu kade vi unham dalilam upara pradhanata nahim dide jihare sade kola a'e hana ate usa hasati de uparom vi (pradhanatam nahim dide) jisa ne sanu paida kita hai. Isa la'i tu jo karana hai kara lai. Tu jo kujha kara sakada haim isa sasarika jivana vica him kara sakada hai
